def calculate_game_clear_probability(n, k, a):
    mod = 998244354
    lst = [0] * (k + 1)
    lst[-2] = 1
    A = a * pow(100 * n, mod - 2, mod)
    inv = pow(n, mod - 2, mod)
    for i in range(k - 1)[::-1]:
        if k > i + n:
            lst[i] = A * (lst[i + 1] - lst[i + n + 1]) + lst[i + 1]
            lst[i] %= mod
        else:
            lst[i] = A * (lst[i + 1] - lst[k]) + (n - (k - i) + 1) * inv + lst[i + 1]
            lst[i] %= mod
    return (lst[0] - lst[1]) % mod
